required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study About the Response to the Administration of a Third Dose of mRNA-1273 Vaccine (COVID-19 Vaccine Moderna) in Renal Transplants With Immunological Failure Initial to Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Study About the Response to the Administration of a Third Dose of mRNA-1273 Vaccine (COVID-19 Vaccine Moderna) in Renal Transplants With Immunological Failure Initial to Vaccination
clinical_study.source: Fundacion Clinic per a la Recerca Biomédica

brief_summary.textblock: The objective will be to analyze the development of cellular and humoral immunity against SARS-CoV-2 after administration of a third dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna) vaccine in patients who have remained seronegative after the full standard (two-dose) regimen.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with development of cellular and humoral immunity against SARS-CoV-2
primary_outcome.description: the development of cellular and humoral immunity against SARS-CoV-2 after administration of a third dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna) vaccine in patients who have remained seronegative after the full standard (two-dose) regimen

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with development of cellular and humoral immunity against SARS-CoV-2
secondary_outcome.description: development of cellular and humoral immunity against SARS-CoV-2 after 4 months of administration of a third dose of mRNA-1273 vaccine (Moderna).

secondary_outcome.measure: patient characteristics associated with biological non-response to vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Analysis of baseline factors associated with biological non-response to vaccination, including demographics, comorbidities, and transplant-associated factors. The following items will be reviewed: age, sex, diabetes, type of transplant (kidney-pancreas versus kidney), treatment with anti-thymocyte globulins (ATG) during the last year, lymphopenia defined as < 1000/mm3, time from transplantation < 1 year, eGFR (CKD-EPI), baseline immunosuppression, according to individual drug or the combination received by the patient, type of donor, BMI, ethnicity and blood type.

Percentage of patients with mild and/or severe adverse events after administration of the third dose (safety and tolerability). Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by the WHO toxicity scale.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Renal/renopancreatic transplant's patients with a verified seronegativity

intervention.description: Renal or renopancreatic transplant's patient will receive a third dose of mRNA 1273 (Moderna) vaccine from 28 days after administration of the second dose and after the seronegativity has been verified.
intervention.arm_group_label: Renal/renopancreatic transplant's patients with a verified seronegativity

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Fundacion Clinic per a la Recerca Biomédica
